headings.usage: Page titles, Card headers, Big metrics

cards.style: Flat white background, subtle border (border-slate-200), soft shadow (shadow-sm)

tables.header: bg-slate-50 text-slate-500 uppercase text-xs font-semibold tracking-wider

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80 border-b border-slate-200/60 sticky top-0 z-50

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Manrope' for all headings and 'IBM Plex Sans' for body text. Import them via Google Fonts in index.css.
Implement the 'Control Room' grid layout for the dashboard: Summary cards on top, detailed tables below.
Use the specified color palette. Do NOT use default Tailwind colors directly; use the custom hex codes provided.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states and transitions.
Use 'lucide-react' for icons. Keep them simple and consistent in size (w-5 h-5 usually).
For the attendance table, use a dense layout but with comfortable padding (py-3) to avoid clicks on wrong rows.
Add 'data-testid' to all buttons, inputs, and key containers.
Do NOT use gradients for text. Keep text high-contrast and readable.
When displaying currency, use a monospace font (JetBrains Mono) for alignment.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Avoid generic 'AI slop' designs. Be bold with whitespace and contrast.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for sticky headers.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles (pill-shaped or slightly rounded).
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures or noise overlays are encouraged for backgrounds.
